verses.roman:
prasanna hañā prabhu tāṅre kṛpā kaila
tāṅra kṛpāya praśna karite tāṅra śakti haila

synonyms: prasanna hañā—being very pleased; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅre—unto him; kṛpā kaila—offered His causeless mercy; tāṅra kṛpāya—by His mercy; praśna karite—to inquire; tāṅra—his; śakti haila—there was strength.
translation: Being pleased with Sanātana Gosvāmī, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu bestowed His causeless mercy upon him. By the Lord's mercy, Sanātana Gosvāmī received the spiritual strength to inquire from Him.
